_header: It is to virtue full good and necessary
Subjects: Arthur, prince of Wales; Catherine of Aragon; pageant verses; occasional verse
_description: The speech of Job in the pageant celebrating the marriage of Prince Arthur and Princess Catherine — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLCottVitAXVI.First Lines: It is to vertu full good & necessaryThe astronomy of the Phylysophers…
BLCottVitAXVI.Last Lines: …ffor concordaunce of the Cardynall vertueOf Attemperaunce atwene your spouse & you
